Wrap-up checklist (2 minutes)
1. Stop server (Ctrl +C)

2. Freeze deps (already done but safe to repeat)

bash Y Copied
pip freeze > requirements.txt

3. Commit & push
bash O) Copy

git add excuse_api.py requirements.txt README.md
git commit -m "feat: complete API (generate, top, emergency)"
git push

With that, the project's functional requirements in the PDF are fully met.
